    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Addiction and neural ageing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neigung und neurales Altern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Penchant et vieillissement neural</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Addiction e envelhecimento neural</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aggiunta ed invecchiare neurale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εθισμός και νευρική γήρανση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Apego y el envejecer de los nervios</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">This unit looks at two topics that are of immense worldwide social, economic, ethical, and political importance – ‘addiction’ and ‘neural ageing’. You will develop a Master's level approach to the study of specific issues within these two important subject areas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">addiction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Aging</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Brain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Dementia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Drugs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Environment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Genes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Genetics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Memory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">neural_ageing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Neurodegeneration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Neuroscience</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Neurotransmitters</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Psychology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Maßeinheit betrachtet zwei Themen, die vom
unermeßlichen weltweiten Sozial-, ökonomischen, ethischen und 
politischen Wert sind? ?addiction? und?neural Altern?. 
Sie entwickeln die waagerecht ausgerichtete Annäherung eines 
Meisters zur Studie der spezifischen Ausgaben innerhalb dieser zwei 
wichtigen Bereiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité regarde deux sujets qui sont 
d'immense importance sociale, économique, morale, et politique 
mondiale ? ?addiction ? et vieillissement ?neural ?. 
Vous développerez l'approche de niveau d'un maître à l'étude
des issues spécifiques dans ces deux domaines importants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade olha dois tópicos que são da 
importância social, econômica, ética, e política worldwide 
immense? ?addiction? e envelhecimento?neural?. Você
desenvolverá a aproximação nivelada de um mestre ao estudo de 
edições específicas dentro destas duas áreas sujeitas importantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità guarda due soggetti che sono di 
importanza sociale, economica, etica e politica in tutto il mondo 
immensa? ?addiction? ed invecchiare?neural?. 
Svilupperete il metodo livellato del supervisore allo studio 
sulle edizioni specifiche all'interno di questi due settori 
importanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα εξετάζει δύο θέματα που είναι 
απέραντης παγκόσμιας κοινωνικής, οικονομικής, ηθικής, και 
πολιτικής σπουδαιότητας; ?addiction; και ?neural 
γήρανση;. Θα αναπτύξετε την προσέγγιση επιπέδων ενός 
κυρίου στη μελέτη των συγκεκριμένων ζητημάτων μέσα σε αυτές τις 
δύο σημαντικές θεματικές περιοχές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Esta unidad mira dos asuntos que sean de 
importancia social, económica, ética, y política mundial inmensa? 
¿?addiction? y el envejecer?neural?. Usted 
desarrollará el acercamiento llano de un amo al estudio de ediciones 
específicas dentro de estos dos temas importantes.</string>
          </description>
